title: Shining a Light on Solar Panels
description: On Earth Day, Christina Mathieson-Segura, director of operations of RCG Mortgages, and Mansion Global reporter Leslie Hendrickson discuss all things solar, from upfront costs to what to do if/when you sell your solar-powered home.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
